text: Does anybody here hide their chat until a “Help”-type button is clicked? Not something HS supports natively…would love some execution tips!
Hi Tim! This article _may_ help, but let me know if that’s not exactly what you’re looking for: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/open-to-chatflow>

Thanks, <@UDPJ43B39>! This might take us where we need to go with `widget.load` – we can set it to not load by default and use that call on a button to trigger it to open…does that sound about right to you?
Yep! So if you set `loadImmediately` to false in *`hsConversationsSettings`* we do not load the widget until `widget.load` is called

Hi there,
Question: If I have a landing page template, I can load external libraries right? If yes, when I add a module that loads the same library, HS handles the duplication of libraries calls?
Thanks so much to both of you! <@U018NUQJ2MC> <@UDPJ43B39>

only if you use `require_js`  do we prevent loading it twice.

Also if you say copied a full library into the module’s js that also would not load more than once per page.

I wouldn’t really advocate copying a full library. into your module.js though as that’s not a great dev experience.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/files#javascript-module-js-|Learn more in our docs>
